bioconda.name: bioconductor-clomial
bioconda.summary: Infers clonal composition of a tumor

biotools.summary: This tool fits binomial distributions to counts obtained from NGS data of multiple samples of the same tumor. The trained parameters can be interpreted to infer the clonal structure of the tumor.

bioschemas.name: Clomial
bioschemas.summary: This tool fits binomial distributions to counts obtained from NGS data of multiple samples of the same tumor. The trained parameters can be interpreted to infer the clonal structure of the tumor.
